                      fr.lipn.nlptools.uima.lia.tagg.LiaCapitalAE
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent
public class LiaCapitalAE
extends LipnLiaExternalProgramGenericAnnotator

this AE is a wrapper for the LIA program "lia_nett_capital", which (as far as i know) simply "cleans" the text by replacing any capital letter which is at the beginning of a sentence by the same lowercase character. In the normal LIA process, should be called after tokenization in words and sentences, but before POS tagging. Important: this AE possibly adds or modifies Cleaned annotations (to reflect the changes made by the wrapped program).

Author:
moreau
